title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description:
Bug 7945 - Search results are not getting selected when searching in external jar. Build version: 200201151.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Make sure JDK 1.3.1 is set as the default JRE and ensure that you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Search for references to the field 'tmpFir'.
